headline: Has Amgen’s 26% Rally in 2025 Already Priced In Its Obesity and Oncology Ambitions?
summary: Wondering if Amgen at around $327 a share is still worth buying, or if the easy money has already been made? You are not alone. Let us break down whether the current price really matches the business underneath. The stock is up 3.0% over the last week and 26.3% year to date, even after a 4.4% dip over the past month, leaving it roughly 28.3% higher than a year ago and 71.9% over five years. That kind of run naturally raises the question of whether investors are now paying too much for future...
